title._cdata: Gadgets 360

description._cdata: Tech News, Latest technology news daily, new best tech gadgets reviews which include mobiles, tablets, laptops, video games. Being a tech news site we cover the latest tech news daily online from India and around the world, reviews, updates on technology today from companies like google, apple, samsung and others also new and upcoming mobiles, cameras, laptops, video games.

title._cdata: Gadgets 360
iPad Air (2020), Magic Keyboard, and Apple Pencil 2 Review: Can They Replace Your Laptop?

description._cdata: Although expensive, the 2020 iPad Air could be a versatile all-rounder, with its slick style and powerful processor, especially when used with the Magic Keyboard and Apple Pencil 2.

title._cdata: Lenovo Tab P11 Pro With Dolby Vision Support, Snapdragon 730G SoC Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description._cdata: Lenovo Tab P11 Pro has been launched in India. The new flagship tablet by the Chinese company is powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 730G SoC and comes with 6GB of RAM.

title._cdata: For All Mankind Time Capsule AR App Bridges the Gap Between Season 1 and Season 2

description._cdata: For All Mankind Time Capsule AR app, out now for iPhone and iPad, explores the decade-long gap between seasons one and two. Its seven interactive chapters feature virtual objects such as Apple II. LiDAR-equipped devices (iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max, and iPad Pro) get two special chapters.

title._cdata: Samsung Days Sale: Offers on Smartphones, Tablets for Valentine’s Week Till February 15

description._cdata: Samsung Days Sale includes offers and discounts on select smartphones and tablets for Valentine’s week. It starts today, February 9, 2021, and will go on till February 15, 2021. Customers can save up to Rs. 10,000 on Samsung Galaxy Tab models with the available offers.

title._cdata: Android 12 Tipped to Come With UI Changes, New Privacy Features

description._cdata: Android 12 will be Google’s next OS for Android devices and it seems like an early draft of a document that summarises Android 12 features has been leaked. It shows screenshots for some of the features that can be expected from the upcoming OS.

title._cdata: Apple’s Default Content Filters Restrict iPhone, iPad Users From Searching for the Word ‘Asian’

description._cdata: Apple’s default content filters that are available through preloaded parental controls on iPhone and iPad are restricting users from searching for the word “Asian.” The restriction isn’t limited to the inbuilt Safari browser but also exists on third-party solutions such as Brave or Chrome.

title._cdata: iPhone, iPad Users Reporting Crashes With Third-Party Apps After Syncing With M1-Powered MacBook Laptops

description._cdata: iPhone and iPad users have reported third-party apps crashing after syncing their phone or tablet with M1 powered MacBook models.

title._cdata: iOS 14.5 to Allow iPhone Users With Face ID to Unlock Phones While Wearing a Mask Using Apple Watch

description._cdata: Apple has brought iOS 14.5 developer beta that comes with the ability to unlock supported iPhones while wearing a mask using an Apple Watch. You will need to manually enable Apple Watch unlocking feature by going to the Settings.

title._cdata: Apple’s India Business Doubled in December Quarter, Says CEO Tim Cook, Optimistic About Trajectory

description._cdata: Apple doubled its business in India in the quarter that ended December 26, CEO Tim Cook revealed during an earnings call on Wednesday. Cook highlighted scope for further growth in the country.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 Lite Could Be in Development, Galaxy Tab A 10.1 (2021) Leaked in Alleged CAD Renders

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 Lite could be in the pipeline as a new report claims it may launch in Wi-Fi, LTE, and 5G variants. A separate report shows alleged CAD-based renders of the rumoured Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 (2021).

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7, Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ Receiving Android 11-Based One UI 3.1 Update: Report

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7, Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+, and Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ 5G in South Korea have reportedly started receiving the Android 11-based One UI 3.1 update. The update include a tweaked UI design.

title._cdata: Apple Store Offering Rs. 5,000 Cashback on Orders Over Rs. 44,900: All the Details

description._cdata: Apple Store is offering Rs. 5,000 cashback to eligible shoppers placing online orders above Rs. 44,900 in India. It will end on January 28 and is only valid for HDFC credit cards and HDFC credit card EMIs only.

title._cdata: Alcatel TKEE Mini, TKEE Mid, TKEE Max Rugged Android Tablets for Kids Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description._cdata: Alcatel TKEE Mini, TKEE Mid, and TKEE Max kids tablets have been launched by TCL in India. The new tablets come with TÜV Rheinland-certified Eye Care displays.

title._cdata: Alcatel 3L (2021), Alcatel 1S (2021), Alcatel 1L (2021) Phones, Alcatel 1T 7 Wi-Fi Tablet Launched: Price, Specifications

description._cdata: Alcatel 1L (2021) features a 6.1-inch HD+ LCD display and has a dual camera setup. The Alcatel 3L, on the other hand, brings a 6.52-inch LCD display with full-HD+ resolution and a triple rear camera setup with a 48-megapixel primary camera.

title._cdata: From PBX to Bixby, How Samsung Research Evolved in India Over 25 Years

description._cdata: Samsung’s research and development (R&D) has been evolved a lot in the last 25 years. Dipesh Shah, the Managing Director of the Samsung R&D Institute India-Bengalore (SRI-B) told Gadgets 360 that it moved from building technologies for call centres to developing advanced voice intelligence for Bixby and bringing vision AI to mobile devices.

title._cdata: TCL Tab 10s and NXTPAPER Tablets, New TV Sets, OD Zero Mini-LED Technology Announced at CES 2021

description._cdata: The TCL Tab 10s, the tablet is priced at EUR 199 for the Wi-Fi model and EUR 249 for the 4G model. On the other hand, the TCL NXTPAPER tablet is priced at EUR 349. It will be available in Europe, Middle East, Africa, Latin America, and the Asia Pacific regions from April onwards.

title._cdata: HP Envy 14, HP Elite Dragonfly Max Laptops, HP Elite Folio Tablet, and HP Elite Wireless Earbuds Launched at CES 2021

description._cdata: In its Elite range of laptops, HP has introduced HP Elite Dragonfly G2, HP Elite Dragonfly Max, HP EliteBook 840 Aero G8, HP EliteBook x360 1030 G8, HP EliteBook x360 1040 G8, and HP Elite x2 G8. HP Elite Dragonfly G2, HP Elite Dragonfly Max, HP EliteBook x360 1030 G8, and HP EliteBook x360 1040 G8 are expected to be made available in January. The HP EliteBook 840 Aer...

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab M62 Images Surface Online, Tipped to Be in Production in India

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab M62 may be launched in India soon, as images of the tablet have surfaced online. It is already in production at Samsung’s Greater Noida facility, as per a report. Samsung Galaxy Tab M62 appears to have a large battery unit and a centre-aligned hole-punch cutout for the selfie camera.

title._cdata: Apple Temporarily Shuts California Stores in Virus Surge, Some in UK After New Curbs

description._cdata: Apple has temporarily shut all of its 53 stores in California, US, because of a coronavirus outbreak and 16 stores in the UK following restrictions introduced by the government in London.

title._cdata: iOS 14 Now Running on 81 Percent of iPhone Models Released in Last Four Years, Apple Says

description._cdata: iOS 14 is running on 81 percent of all iPhone models introduced in the last four years, according to Apple. The company shared that 75 percent of iPad models launched in the last four years are running iPadOS 14.

title._cdata: iOS, iPadOS 14.3 Update With Apple Fitness+ and AirPods Max Support Released; WatchOS 7.2 Brings Cardio Fitness Alerts

description._cdata: Apple has released iOS 14.3, iPadOS 14.3, and WatchOS 7.2 updates, which include the support for Apple Fitness+, a new subscription-based fitness service from Apple. The iOS 14.3 update also includes for ProRAW support for iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max. WatchOS 7.2 brings new cardio fitness levels and alerts.

title._cdata: Xiaomi Mi Reader Pro With 7.8-Inch E-Ink Display, 24 Levels of Adjustable Colour Tone Launched

description._cdata: Mi Reader Pro has been launched in China and is on sale via Xiaomi Youpin. The e-book reader comes with 2GB RAM and 32GB storage that can store thousands of books.

title._cdata: Apple Fan? Here's the Cost of Owning Every Consumer Product and Service It Sells

description._cdata: Apple has always been a premium brand. Apple has tried placing itself as a more accessible brand by releasing the budget iPhone SE earlier this year. For those with enough money to spend, Apple offers myriad ways to squander your money.

title._cdata: MacBook Pro Redesigned Mini-LED Models to Launch 2021, Mini-LED iPad to Launch in First Half: Ming-Chi Kuo

description._cdata: Apple will reportedly bring two new MacBook Pro laptops next year, TF Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggests. Kuo predicts that the two MacBook Pro models with mini-LED displays and Apple Silicon chip should launch next year, while a redesigned MacBook Air with mini-LED and Apple Silicon may launch in 2022. New iPad models with mini-LED display are also expected to ...

title._cdata: iPad Pro 2021 High-End Models Expected to Come With 5G mmWave Support: Report

description._cdata: iPad Pro next-gen line-up will reportedly support 5G mmWave technology seen on current generation iPhone 12 models in the US. This technology is said to offer faster speeds than sub-6GHz 5G at short distances. A new report suggests that Apple is actively developing its own in-house mmWave AiP (antenna in package) to integrate it into more of its portfolio, apart from ...

title._cdata: Foxconn Said to Shift Some Apple Production to Vietnam to Minimise China Risk

description._cdata: Foxconn is moving some iPad and MacBook assembly to Vietnam from China at the request of Apple, as the US firm diversifies production to minimise the impact of a Sino-US trade war.

title._cdata: iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max Demand Surpasses Expectations; New iPad Air Also Grabs Attention: Kuo

description._cdata: Demand for the iPhone 12 Pro and the iPhone 12 Pro Max has surpassed prior expectations, while the iPhone 12 and the iPhone 12 mini demand is not as high as expected, according to Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. He also reportedly stated that the initial demand for the new iPad Air was better than anticipated.

title._cdata: iPad Pro Lineup to Get OLED Displays in 2021: Report

description._cdata: Apple is expected to launch its new iPad Pro lineup in 2021 with OLED screens, as per a report. The new lineup could come after next-generation iPad models that are rumoured to come with mini-LED displays.

title._cdata: macOS Big Sur 11.1 Beta Released for Developers; iOS 14.3, iPadOS 14.3 Second Beta Debut as Well

description._cdata: Apple has released the first developer beta of macOS Big Sur 11.1 less than a week after launching the latest operating system to the public. The company has also released a second developer beta for iOS 14.3 and iPadOS 14.3.

title._cdata: HBO Max App Now Available on Amazon Fire TV

description._cdata: HBO Max app is now available on Amazon Fire TV devices, Amazon Fire tablets, and Fire TV Edition smart TVs. HBO Max will be compatible with Alexa.

description._cdata: Microsoft Surface Go 2 tablet and Microsoft Surface Book 3 has been launched in India. Microsoft Surface Go 2 base 4GB RAM + 64GB storage model is priced in India starting at Rs. 42,999 (Intel Pentium Gold processor) and Rs. 47,599 (Intel Core M3).  Microsoft Surface Book 3 comes in two sizes – 13-inch and 15-inch – and the smaller model with 8GB RAM, 256GB storag...

title._cdata: Apple iPad With Mini-LED Display, AirPods 3 to Launch in First Half of 2021: Ming-Chi Kuo

description._cdata: Apple could be close to bringing its first iPad with a Mini-LED display, as well as the AirPods 3, in the first half of 2021, according to leading analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. The company is expected to invest heavily in Mini-LED technology in the coming years.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7| S7+ Come With All the Features Millennials Need
Lenovo, Apple Lead PC Segment in Q3, Chromebooks Were Bestsellers: Canalys

description._cdata: Canalys report suggests that Chromebooks saw an impressive growth in Q3 2020, with HP more than doubling the volumes from a year ago to hit 3.2 million units. Most of the shipments from HP were directed to the US. In the Chromebooks category, Lenovo stands second with 1.8 million units shipped with an year-on-year growth of 300 percent.

title._cdata: iPad mini 6 Specifications Surface Online, Tipped to Look Like iPad Air 4

description._cdata: iPad mini 6 specifications have been leaked online. The new iPad mini model is said to come with Apple Pencil 2 support as well as include A14 Bionic chip.

Samsung Galaxy Tab S7| S7+ Will Change the Way You Work and Play
iOS 14.2, iPadOS 14.2, macOS 10.15.7, tvOS 14.2, watchOS 7.1, HomePod Software 14.2 Updates Released by Apple

description._cdata: Apple has released software updates for its iPhones and iPads, smartwatch, HomePod, tvOS, and laptops. iPhones get iOS 14.2 and older models have received iOS 12.4.9. Apple Watch models have got watchOS 7.1, HomePod and tvOS get software version 14.2, and macOS gets Catalina 10.15.7 supplemental update.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ Review

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ is a flagship Android tablet that offers a massive AMOLED display and a flagship Qualcomm Snapdragon 865+ processor powering it. We review the premium tablet to see if its the best Android tablet you can get for your money.

title._cdata: Why Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Is Perfect for Binge-Watching Your Favourite Shows and Movies
Sony, OmniVision Receive US Licences to Export Sensors to Huawei: Report

description._cdata: Sony and OmniVision have been granted US licences to resume shipping some image sensors to China's Huawei, Nikkei Asia reported on Thursday, citing multiple sources familiar with the matter.

title._cdata: Apple Grew to 29.2 Percent of Global Tablet Shipments in Q3 2020, Samsung in Second Place: IDC Report

description._cdata: Apple has once again captured top spot in the global tablet shipments by registering 29.2 percent market share in the third quarter of 2020. Samsung takes the second spot with a massive 89.2 percent YoY growth.

title._cdata: Apple Sets a Quarterly Record in India, Working ‘Really Hard’ to Solve Supply Constraints: CEO Tim Cook

description._cdata: Apple has set a new quarterly record in India for its September quarter, Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook announced during an earnings call on Thursday. The 59-year-old executive did not reveal any exact revenues for the Indian market, though he considered the launch of Apple’s online store in the country as a part of the latest success.

title._cdata: AMD to Buy Xilinx in All-Stock Deal Valued at $35 Billion

description._cdata: AMD is buying Xilinx for $35 billion (roughly Rs. 2,57,900 crores) in an all-stock deal that will combine the two Silicon Valley chip makers. The deal announced Tuesday puts AMD in a place it wants to be; competing more fiercely with Intel.

title._cdata: Samsung Electronics Chairman Lee Kun-hee Dies at 78

description._cdata: Samsung Electronics chairman Lee Kun-hee, who transformed the South Korean firm into a global tech titan, died at the age of 78 on Sunday, the company said. Under Lee's leadership, Samsung rose to become the world's largest producer of smartphones and memory chips, and the firm's overall turnover today is equivalent to a fifth of South Korea's GDP.

title._cdata: iOS 14.1, iPadOS 14.1 Released With 10-Bit HDR Video Playback, Edit Support for Earlier Models

description._cdata: Apple has released iOS 14.1 and iPadOS 14.1 as the latest improvement-focussed updates for compatible iPhone and iPad models. The new updates come less than a month after the company rolled out iOS 14.0.1 and iPadOS 14.0.1 as the early bug fix releases post the debut of iOS 14 and iPadOS 14.

title._cdata: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale: Samsung Galaxy S20+, Galaxy Note 10+, Galaxy F41, More Receive Price Discounts

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy S20+, Galaxy Note 10+, Galaxy Tab A 8.0, and Galaxy Watch are available on discounted prices under Flipkart’s Big Billion Days sale. The sale is currently live for Flipkart Plus members. Flipkart is also set to offer a Rs. 1,000 prepaid discount along with a 10 percent instant discount for SBI customers purchasing the newly launched Galaxy F41.

title._cdata: TSMC Hikes Forecast as COVID-19 Pandemic Transforms Digital Demand

description._cdata: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co (TSMC) hiked its revenue outlook again this year after logging record quarterly profit, noting the coronavirus pandemic was driving demand for advanced chips.

title._cdata: Microsoft Surface Pro X 2020 Now Available for Purchase in India, Pricing Starts at Rs. 1,49,999

description._cdata: Surface Pro X 2020 with Microsoft SQ2 processor and a new Platinum finish is now available for purchase in India. Microsoft launched the new Surface Pro X as its latest Windows-based tablet earlier this month.

title._cdata: Microsoft to Let Some Employees Work From Home Permanently

description._cdata: Software giant Microsoft will let employees work from home permanently if they choose to, US media reported on Friday, becoming the latest employer to expand work-from-home provisions prompted by the COVID-19 pandemic.

title._cdata: US Supreme Court to Mull Google Bid to End Oracle Copyright Suit

description._cdata: The US Supreme Court on Wednesday is set to consider whether to protect Alphabet Inc's Google from a long-running lawsuit by Oracle Corp accusing it of infringing Oracle copyrights to build the Android operating system that runs most of the world's smartphones.

title._cdata: Google, Oracle's Decade-Long Copyright Battle Heads Up to US Supreme Court

description._cdata: A decade-old legal battle between Silicon Valley giants Oracle and Google over software rights moves to the Supreme Court Wednesday, in a case with enormous implications for copyright in the digital era.

title._cdata: SMIC Has Had 'Preliminary Exchanges' With US Over Export Restrictions, Company Says

description._cdata: Chinese chipmaker Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corporation (SMIC) has undertaken "preliminary exchanges" with the US Bureau of Industry and Security regarding export restrictions, the company said on Sunday in a filing.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Wi-Fi Variant Available for Pre-Order on Amazon, Will Go on Sale Starting October 12

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Wi-Fi variant has been listed for pre-orders on Amazon and will be available exclusively on the e-commerce platform and Samsung.com. The Galaxy Tab A7 features a 10.4-inch display and quad speakers for an immersive experience. It will be available from October 12.

title._cdata: Google Said to Face Antitrust Probe in China Over Android Dominance

description._cdata: China is preparing to launch an antitrust probe into Alphabet Inc's Google, looking into allegations it has leveraged the dominance of its Android mobile operating system to stifle competition, two people familiar with the matter said.

title._cdata: iOS 14.2 to Bring Set of New Emojis Including Transgender Flag, Disguised Face, More

description._cdata: Apple released a new beta update for iOS 14 and it comes with a new set of emojis, as per a report. The update carries version number iOS 14.2 beta 2 and adds emojis such as transgender flag, seal, Disguised Face, Smiling Face with Tear, and many more.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 With 10.4-Inch Display, Quad Speakers Launched in India

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 has been launched in India with impressive specifications and a price tag to match. It is offered in an LTE and a Wi-Fi variant, as well as three colour options. Samsung says the Galaxy Tab A7 is an entertainment powerhouse with its 10.4-inch display and quad speaker setup.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 3 With Enhanced Durability Launched: Specifications

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 3 is official and it is designed to be more durable and useful for field-based working staff.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Teased to Launch in India Soon

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 will soon be launched in India, an Amazon India teaser has revealed. The development comes a couple of weeks after the tablet’s support pages went live on Samsung India's website.

title._cdata: China Must Prepare for 'Long Tech March' Following US Restrictions on SMIC: State Media

description._cdata: China must engage in a new "long march" in the technology sector now that the US has imposed export restrictions on Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp (SMIC), the country's largest chip manufacturer, Chinese state-backed tabloid the Global Times wrote.

title._cdata: Why Microsoft Surface Devices Are Great for Working From Home
Apple Watch Series 6, Apple Watch SE, iPad (8th Gen) Go on Sale via Apple Store Online in India

description._cdata: Apple Watch Series 6, Apple Watch SE, and iPad (8th Gen) are up for sale on the newly opened Indian Apple Store Online. The official Indian store went live today, September 23, and brings a whole slew of Apple products, including the newly released Apple Watch Series 6, Apple Watch SE, and iPad (8th Gen).

title._cdata: Huawei Chairman Urges US to Reconsider 'Attack' on Global Supply Chain

description._cdata: Huawei said on Wednesday its supply chain was under attack from the United States and called on Washington to reconsider its trade restrictions which were hurting suppliers globally.

title._cdata: Huawei Plans More Cuts to Jobs, Investment in Australia

description._cdata: The Australian operation of Chinese telecommunications equipment maker Huawei Technologies said it would continue to cut staff numbers and investment in the country amid strained relations between Beijing and Canberra.

title._cdata: Arm-Nvidia Deal: Britain Assessing Impact of Sale, Minister Says

description._cdata: Britain is assessing the impact of the sale of chip designer Arm to US company Nvidia, including commitments to keep its head office and staff in Cambridge, Eastern England, digital minister Caroline Dinenage said.

title._cdata: iOS 14 Bug Resets Default Mail and Browser App Settings After Every Reboot

description._cdata: iOS 14 has been released for all iPhone and iPad users earlier this week, and one of the new features includes the ability to change the default browser and mail app settings. However, a new bug has now been reported that apparently resets Mail and Safari as default mail and browsers apps after an iPhone or iPad is rebooted.

title._cdata: Microsoft Surface Pro X to Get SQ2 Chip Upgrade, Platinum Colour Option: Report

description._cdata: Microsoft Surface Pro X is reportedly getting a refresh with an upgraded Microsoft SQ2 processor, a new platinum colour option, and new Type Cover colours. It is expected to launch in October this year.

title._cdata: Apple Begins Ditching Bundled Chargers: Eco-Friendly Move or Cynical Stinginess?

description._cdata: Apple has announced that new Apple Watch models will not ship with chargers, fuelling speculation that the iPhone 12 series will also ditch the usual bundled accessories.

title._cdata: Apple A14 Bionic Chip Makes Its Way to iPad Air (4th Gen) Before iPhone 12

description._cdata: iPad Air (4th Gen) has made its debut with the new and improved Apple A14 Bionic processor before the iPhone 12 and this has happened after 9 years. Apple typically keeps its new processors for its latest iPhone models but this time, the iPad Air has got the new chipset before the iPhone 12.

title._cdata: iOS 14 Release Set for September 17, iPadOS 14, watchOS 7, tvOS 14 to Debut As Well

description._cdata: iOS 14 release date is set for September 17. CEO Tim Cook revealed the release date of iOS 14 at Apple’s virtual event on Tuesday. Alongside the latest iOS version, Apple is releasing iPadOS 14, watchOS 7, and tvOS 14 later today.

title._cdata: iPad Air (4th Gen) With A14 Bionic SoC, All-Screen Design Announced, iPad (8th Gen) Updated

description._cdata: The new iPad Air (4th Gen) gets an all-screen design and powerful new SoC, while the iPad (8th Gen) gets refreshed while remaining affordable

title._cdata: Apple Event Today: How to Watch Live Stream, What to Expect From September 15 Event

description._cdata: Apple event is taking place virtually later today where the Cupertino company is expected to unveil the new generations of the Apple Watch and iPad Air. The event that Apple calls “Time flies” is likely to see the launch of the Apple Watch Series 6.

title._cdata: Apple Event: New iPad, Apple Watch Series 6, Apple Watch SE Specifications Leaked Hours Before Launch

description._cdata: Apple event today will see new product launches and the Cupertino, California-based giant is largely expected to launch new iPad and Apple Watch models.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Support Pages Go Live on Samsung India Website, Launch Expected Soon

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 is expected to make its debut in India soon, as the tablet’s support pages have now gone live on Samsung India’s website. The premature listings carry Wi-Fi-only and LTE variants – carrying model numbers SM-T500 and SM-T505 - of the tablet.

title._cdata: Apple Out to Reignite Growth With iPad, Watch, and Subscription Updates

description._cdata: Apple is expected to spotlight its smartwatch, iPad, and subscription services on Tuesday as it strives to reignite growth with a must-have holiday lineup.

title._cdata: Apple Watch SE, iPad Air 4, iPad 8 Tipped to Debut at Time Flies Event on September 15

description._cdata: Apple is expected to unveil a new affordable Apple Watch, a new iPad Air, and iPad at its Time Flies event scheduled for September 15.

title._cdata: Huawei's Chip Supply and Growth Affected by US Sanctions, Richard Yu Says

description._cdata: A Huawei executive says that recent US sanctions against the company have caused a shortage of computer chips for the company, hurting the growth of its smartphone business.

title._cdata: Huawei MatePad T10, MatePad T10s With HiSilicon Kirin 710A SoC, Kids Corner Feature Launched

description._cdata: Huawei MatePad T10 and MatePad T10s have been launched as the company’s latest Android tablets. Both new tablets come with Huawei HiSilicon Kirin 710A SoC and have EMUI 10.1.

title._cdata: Apple Schedules 'Time Flies' Event for September 15, New Watch and iPad Models Expected

description._cdata: Apple has sent out invites for a virtual event on September 15, and while in previous years the company could have been expected to launch its iPhone 12 series in September - this year new iPad Air and Apple Watch models are expected.

title._cdata: Huawei MatePad T8 With 5,100mAh Battery, MediaTek Octa-Core SoC Launched in India

description._cdata: Huawei MatePad T8 tablet has been launched in India after making its global debut back in May. The budget-friendly tablet offers an 8-inch display and has relatively thick bezels on the sides.

title._cdata: Apple May Reveal iPhone 12 Launch Date Later This Week

description._cdata: Apple may reveal the date of the iPhone 12 event sometime later this week, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman suggested through a tweet posted on Monday. It’s expected that the Cupertino giant would unveil the new Apple Watch and iPad models alongside the iPhone 12 series at the event, which will almost certainly be held virtually.

title._cdata: IFA Tech Trade Fair Is Back, but 240,000 Visitors Aren't

description._cdata: Six months after the COVID-19 pandemic forced the sudden cancellation of the Mobile World Congress, the technology trade fair business is mounting a comeback with a scaled-back version of the IFA consumer electronics fair in Berlin.

title._cdata: IFA 2020: TCL Launches Two Tablets, Smartwatch for Seniors, Truly Wireless Earbuds

description._cdata: TCL has announced two new tablets, a smartwatch, and a pair of truly wireless earbuds at ongoing IFA 2020 trade fair. The new tablets are called TCL 10 Tab Max and TCL 10 Tab Mid, whereas the new smartwatch is called TCL Move Time Family Watch MT43A.

title._cdata: Apple Delays iOS 14 Change Likely to Stymie Mobile Ad Targeting

description._cdata: Apple said on Thursday it would give developers until next year to comply with a software change expected to stymie targeted advertising in iPhone and iPad apps.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 With 10.4-Inch Screen, Quad Speakers, Dolby Atmos Support Launched

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 has been announced by the South Korean tech giant as its latest tablet offering. Announced as part of its Life Unstoppable virtual event, the Galaxy Tab A7 features a large screen with an 80 percent screen-to-body ratio.

title._cdata: Apple Said to Be Preparing 75 Million 5G iPhone Units Alongside New Watch, iPad Models

description._cdata: Apple is said to have asked suppliers to build at least 75 million 5G iPhones for later this year, roughly in line with last year’s launch, in a sign that demand for the company’s most important product is holding up in the midst of the global pandemic and recession, Bloomberg News reports.

title._cdata: Lenovo Tab P11 Pro With 2K OLED Display Launched, Lenovo Tab M10 HD Gen 2 Debuts As Well

description._cdata: Lenovo Tab P11 Pro and Tab M10 HD Gen 2 have been unveiled as the company’s latest tablets. Lenovo has also launched the Smart Tab M10 HD 2nd Gen with Google Assistant and Smart Tab M10 HD 2nd Gen with Alexa Built-in.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Price Leaked by Dutch Retailer Ahead of Launch

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 has leaked on a Dutch retailer website revealing price ahead of official launch. The retailer tips product availability from September 11 2020

title._cdata: MediaTek Pushes for Permission to Supply Huawei After US Curbs

description._cdata: Taiwanese chip designer MediaTek said on Friday it had applied to the US government for permission to continue supplying China's Huawei after new US curbs take effect in mid-September amid rising China-US tensions.

title._cdata: iPad and Apple Watch New Models Allegedly Certified on EEC, iPad Air 4 Leak Surfaces Online

description._cdata: Apple has registered seven new iPad models with the EEC with model numbers A2270, A2072, A2316, A2324, A2325, A2428 and A2429. All of these models are reported to run on iPadOS 14. Eight model numbers of the Apple Watch - A2291, A2292, A2351, A2352 , A2375, A2376, A2355 and A2356 - have reportedly been listed on EEC.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7, Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ With 120Hz Display, Snapdragon 865+ SoC Launched in India

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and Galaxy Tab S7+ have been launched in India. The tablets come with flagship specifications like 120Hz refresh rate screens, Snapdragon 865+ SoC, and S Pen support.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7, Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ Tipped to Go on Sale in India on September 7

description._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ are reported to go on sale in India on September 7. The two tablets were unveiled earlier this month, alongside the Galaxy Note 20 series, but at that time, India availability or pricing was not announced.

title._cdata: Apple Said to Plan Starting Online Sales in India Next Month

description._cdata: Apple is poised to open an online store for the first time in the fast-growing smartphone market of India next month, according to a person with knowledge of the matter, taking advantage of a relaxation of once-strict prohibitions against foreign direct retail.

title._cdata: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra, Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 Users Report of Strange ‘Green Tint’ Issue

description._cdata: Several users on Reddit are complaining of a greenish glow on their Samsung Galaxy Tab S7, Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+, and Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra screens, if the brightness goes below a specific fixed limit. The same issue was reported by early adopters of the Samsung Galaxy S20 range earlier this year, and this was fixed through a single software update by Samsung.

title._cdata: Foxconn, Pegatron, More Asian Firms Said to Consider Mexico Factories as China Risks Grow

Apple said on Wednesday it is expanding a program to supply repair parts, tools and manuals for iPhones to independent repair shops in 32 countries in Europe as well as Canada.
